messages.title: Standing up for South Wales East
messages.content: Welsh Labour will deliver fairness for local families, communities and businesses. The Tory cuts are hitting South Wales hard. Welsh Labour is standing up for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To help hard-working families and encourage people back to work.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More apprenticeships and jobs for young people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Offering more apprenticeships and jobs to support the younger demographic.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Access to GP surgeries in the evenings and on Saturdays

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Enhanced support for the education sector.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An extra 500 PCSOs for safer communities
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Boosting community safety with additional police community support officers.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Double the number of children's nurses and health visitors
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing in healthcare professionals specializing in child care.

issues.education: Free school breakfasts and school milk for the under 7s. More funding for our schools.
issues.health: Free prescriptions to help hard-working families and encourage people back to work. Access to GP surgeries in the evenings and on Saturdays.
issues.socialWelfare: Free bus travel for pensioners and disabled people and their carers.

housing.content: Help for people who have been made redundant â€“ building on the successful ReAct programme.

quotes.text: During these tough times, Welsh Labour will be standing up for families, businesses and communities right across Wales.
